snippet: The leaders of both houses of Congress are among those to be investigated, by order of the Supreme Federal Tribunal, the nation’s highest court.
abstract: Brazil's Supreme Federal Tribunal authorizes investigation into dozens of country's top politicians in ongoing bribery scandal.
lead_paragraph: The leaders of both houses of Congress are among those to be investigated, by order of the Supreme Federal Tribunal, the nation’s highest court.

headline.main: Brazil Bribery Inquiry Targets Top Politicians
headline.print_headline: Brazil Bribery Inquiry Targets Top Politicians
